trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Lucidchart | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Lucidchart | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Lucidchart with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Lucidchart with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Lucidchart
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Lucidchart

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=532346).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=532346).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Lucidchart.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Lucidchart.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Lucidchart single sign-on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: A Lucidchart single sign-on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Lucidchart will be able to single sign into the application at your Lucidchart company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Lucidchart will be able to single sign into the application at your Lucidchart company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Lucidchart
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Lucidchart

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Lucidchart
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Lucidchart

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Lucidchart.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Lucidchart.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for Lucidchart, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for Lucidchart, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **Lucidchart**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **Lucidchart**.

trans-unit.source: Application Gallery
trans-unit.target: Application Gallery

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **Lucidchart**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **Lucidchart**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: Lucidchart
trans-unit.target: Lucidchart

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Lucidchart with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Lucidchart with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Lucidchart** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Lucidchart** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Lucidchart** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Lucidchart** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Lucidchart Sign On URL** textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign on to your Lucidchart application (e.g.: "*https://chart2.office.lucidchart.com/saml/sso/azure*"), and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Lucidchart Sign On URL** textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign on to your Lucidchart application (e.g.: "*https://chart2.office.lucidchart.com/saml/sso/azure*"), and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure App URL
trans-unit.target: Configure App URL

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at Lucidchart** page, to download your metadata, click **Download metadata**, and then save the data file locally on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at Lucidchart** page, to download your metadata, click **Download metadata**, and then save the data file locally on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your Lucidchart company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your Lucidchart company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the top, click **Team**.
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the top, click **Team**.

trans-unit.source: Team
trans-unit.target: Team

trans-unit.source: Click **Application \> Manage SAML**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Application \> Manage SAML**.

trans-unit.source: Manage SAML
trans-unit.target: Manage SAML

trans-unit.source: On the **SAML Authentication Settings** dialog page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **SAML Authentication Settings** dialog page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Select **Enable SAML Authentication**, and then click **Optional**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Enable SAML Authentication**, and then click **Optional**.

trans-unit.source: ![SAML Authentication Settings](./media/active-directory-saas-lucidchart-tutorial/IC791192.png "SAML Authentication Settings")
trans-unit.target: ![SAML Authentication Settings](./media/active-directory-saas-lucidchart-tutorial/IC791192.png "SAML Authentication Settings")

trans-unit.source: In the **Domain** textbox, type your domain, and then click **Change Certificate**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Domain** textbox, type your domain, and then click **Change Certificate**.

trans-unit.source: ![Change Certificate](./media/active-directory-saas-lucidchart-tutorial/IC791193.png "Change Certificate")
trans-unit.target: ![Change Certificate](./media/active-directory-saas-lucidchart-tutorial/IC791193.png "Change Certificate")

trans-unit.source: Open your downloaded metadata file, copy the content, and then paste it into the **Upload Metadata** textbox.
trans-unit.target: Open your downloaded metadata file, copy the content, and then paste it into the **Upload Metadata** textbox.

trans-unit.source: ![Upload Metadata](./media/active-directory-saas-lucidchart-tutorial/IC791194.png "Upload Metadata")
trans-unit.target: ![Upload Metadata](./media/active-directory-saas-lucidchart-tutorial/IC791194.png "Upload Metadata")

trans-unit.source: Select **Automatically Add new user to the team**, and then click **Save changes**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Automatically Add new user to the team**, and then click **Save changes**.

trans-unit.source: ![Save Changes](./media/active-directory-saas-lucidchart-tutorial/IC791195.png "Save Changes")
trans-unit.target: ![Save Changes](./media/active-directory-saas-lucidchart-tutorial/IC791195.png "Save Changes")

trans-unit.source: Select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: Select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: There is no action item for you to configure user provisioning to Lucidchart.
trans-unit.target: There is no action item for you to configure user provisioning to Lucidchart.

trans-unit.source: When an assigned user tries to log into Lucidchart using the access panel, Lucidchart checks whether the user exists.
trans-unit.target: When an assigned user tries to log into Lucidchart using the access panel, Lucidchart checks whether the user exists.

trans-unit.source: If there is no user account available yet, it is automatically created by Lucidchart.
trans-unit.target: If there is no user account available yet, it is automatically created by Lucidchart.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to Lucidchart, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to Lucidchart, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **Lucidchart **application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Lucidchart **application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign Users
trans-unit.target: Assign Users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
